Proficiency with firearms gives you greater accuracy while
shooting. A passive skill.
name: Gun proficiency

description:
Advanced use of pistols. Precise shots can occasionally 
dismember opponents. Used on field.
name: Gunslinger

description:
Advanced use of trenchguns. You are able to execute a stunned
enemy by shooting it again on the field.
name: Executioner

Advanced use of rifles. You are able to one-shot enemies
with the rifle every now and then. Used on field.
name: Marksmanship

description:
Engrave a sigil on a party member. The benefit of the sigil varies
depeding on the god it belongs to. Historically sigils were carved
name: Engrave
note: on the body, but modern practition prefers face sigils.

description: A vicious ramming attack.
name: Rampage

description:
Your advanced knowledge in occult arts enables you to start 
a battle with an extra Rev point. A passive skill.
name: Advanced occultism

description:
Reach a higher state of awareness. Meditate while guarding to gain 
extra Rev points on that turn.
name: Meditation
Mucus and slime drips from the trout...
The crimson father is focusing its attention...
The crimson father began trembling furiously...

description:
Harvest organs from fallen foes to sacrifice them with your 
medicinal skills. The desecration of bodies used to be a taboo
name: Organ harvest
note: subject, but it is now widely used among medical practitioners.

description:
Sacrifice harvested organs to Vitruvia, the architect of the human
body. A sacrifice will cure a corresponding status ailment. Medicinal
name: Medicinal
note: is based on the law where every action has an equal reaction.

description:
A greater form of medicinal where the surgeon will sacrifice
their own limbs in exhange for human life. The procedure must be
name: Magna-medicinal
note: performed on the spot during an encounter to work properly.

description:
Study the anatomy of your opponent to quickly find the biggest
weaknesses it their physique.
name: Analyze

description:
Craft bear traps and booby traps from different utility items.
Used in the Crafting menu.
name: Trapcraft

description:
Use your imagination to craft unique weapons from different
utility items. Used in the Crafting menu.
name: Weaponcraft

description:
Short circuit an electric lock to open locked doors.
Relatively simple in practice, but short circuiting the wrong
name: Short circuit
note: conductors might lock the door for good.

description: Sacrifice a kidney to Vitruvia to cure poison.
name: Remedial poison

description: Sacrifice a liver to Vitruvia to cure toxic.
name: Remedial toxic

description: Sacrifice a thymus to Vitruvia to cure infections.
name: Remedial infection

description: Sacrifice a heart to Vitruvia to cure bleeding.
name: Remedial bleeding

description: Sacrifice parathyroid glands to Vitruvia to cure fractures.
name: Remedial fracture

description: Sacrifice an eye to Vitruvia to cure blindness.
name: Remedial blindness

description:
Analyze the enemy behaviour and find the weak points. You can
use the acquired information against similar type enemies.
name: Greater analyze

description:
Your greater knowledge in occult arts enables you to start 
a battle with 2 extra Rev points. A passive skill.
name: Greater occultism

description:
Draw a warding sigil on the ground to fend off malice and
creatures with ill intent. Originally created by the Virgin
name: Warding sigil

description:
A ritual dance used to channel otherwordly powers to be used
by the performer. Raises otherwordly powers gradually over the
name: La Danse Macabre
note: course of a fight. A passive skill.

description:
Reach a greater state of awareness. Meditate while guarding to gain 
even more Rev points on that turn.
name: Greater meditation

description:
Spice forges were widely used by magick practitioners of the
Middle East back in the day. Spices make it possible to customize
name: Spice forge
note: the properties of your otherwordly skills.

description:
Years spent studying blood magic has given you an ability
to use magic more efficiently.
name: Greater blood magic

description:
Sacrifice your own blood for Gro-goroth, the god of destruction.
A blood sacrifice will enhance your affinity with the said god.
name: Blood sacrifice
note: Sacrifices like these were everyday occurences back in the day.

description:
An act of self-love enhances your affinity with Sylvian when
performed on a ritual circle. This act is widely popular among
name: Masturbation
note: the priests of Vatican when mixed with blood sacrifice.

description:
Slowing down your breath and concentrating on the matters at
hand. You don't need to eat quite as often. You only need few
name: Slow metabolism

description:
Greater culinary skills enable you to cook meals that have
special nutritional properties. These include various stat boosts.
name: Masterchef

description:
Proficiency with melee weapons gives you greater accuracy when
fighting with a weapon you can swing. A passive skill.
name: Melee proficiency

description:
The skill to condense the effective properties of different
poisonous plants to maximize their potential. Teaches you the
name: Toxicology
note: recipes for condensed nettle and condensed hemlock.

description:
You can harvest irritable and poisonous plants safely and also
tell apart the plants that have potential use in your situation.
name: Undergrowth awareness
note: A passive skill useful on the field.

description:
The skill to condense the effective properties of herbs and
plants to maximize their potential. Teaches you the recipes for
name: Advanced botanism
note: condensed blue and green herbs as well as lavender.

description:
Coat your weapon in poison extracted from the local plantlife.
The poison tip takes a small toll on your sanity because of the
name: Poison tip
note: constant stress of handling a poison coated weapon.

description:
Raise your speed with swift footwork. In most cases you get
and extra turn between enemy attacks.
name: Fast stance

description:
A defensive technique where one bobs their head laterally to an
incoming attack while shifting balance to either left or right.
name: Bob and weave

description: Stay alert for enemy attacks and counter when possible.
name: Counter stance

description:
The longer the combat goes on, the stronger you get as your
blood boils ever hotter.
name: Adrenaline rush

description:
Proficiency with your bare fists gives you greater accuracy when
fighting without a weapon. A passive skill.
name: Bare-fisted proficiency

description:
Intimidation tactics in battle work on those mentally weak.
The effects vary case by case. Used while initiating Talk
name: Intimidate

description:
You killing intent eminates strong. This will scare away the
weaker opponent so you don't need to bother with them.
name: Killing intent

description:
Getting creative in a wartorn times is a must. Craft explosives
to be used in combat from simple everyday ingredients.
name: Explosives

description:
Try to pickpocket goods from your opponents. You never know
what you might find.
name: Steal

description:
Bury your trauma and fears. This reduces your sanity decline while 
exploring. You can deal with the psychiatric collapse and the combat
name: Bury the trauma
note: fatigue once you're in a safer place. After all this...

description:
Give orders to your team to charge and attack the enemy without
wasting their turns.
name: Order, Charge!

description: An ability to open any simple lock with your trusty lockpick.
name: Lockpicking

description:
Persuade your opponents with greater intellect and wit. The effects
vary between enemy to enemy depending on their persona. Used with
name: Persuade

description:
Start the fight by talking to the opponent without wasting a
turn. Maybe you can find a diplomatic resolution before any
name: Diplomacy

description: remove own organs to cause serious damage
name: Reverse-healing

description:
A special stance to raise your accuracy greatly. Often used
during medical surgeries to prevent one's arm from shaking.
name: Precision stance

description:
Study fallen enemies and their anatomy to gain knowledge of
them. Diagnosis also reveals what strategies might work the
name: Diagnosis
note: best when facing similar foes in the future.

description:
The skill doesn't necessarily translate to everyone. Beauty is in
the eye of beholder after all.
name: Rugged handsome looks

description:
A barbaric trait of devouring the carcass of your opponents 
to ease hunger.
name: Devour

description:
Hype yourself into a state of aggression and trance. An old
traditional Oldegårdian folk skill.
name: Bloodlust

description:
Provoke the enemy into attacking you only, leaving others
alone.
name: War cry

Your will to live. You just grind your teeth together instead

A gift from the Moon God himself. Gain access to golden gates

description:
Reveal positions of the other contestants through examining a

note: You can't sense a person without this.

description:
The blood of Alll-mer boils and rages even ages after his death.
Just a drop sends swords to the heart of his enemies. Summon a
name: Blood sword
note: blood sword to wield in battle.

description:
The blood of Alll-mer boils and rages even ages after his death.
Just a drop thrusts spears to the torso of his enemies. Summon a
name: Longinus

description:
A glimpse of the pain and suffering Alll-mer the ascended one

Summon a mischief of rats to disrupt the enemy. Rats spread
